思路: // @Title: 买卖股票的最佳时机 (Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-22 17:40:53 // @Runtime: 3 ms // @Memory: 60.4 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int maxProfit(int[] prices) { int min=prices[0],result=0; for(int i=1;i<prices.length;i++){ min=Math.min(min,prices[i]); if(prices[i]>=min){ result=Math.max(result,prices[i]-min); }else{ min=prices[i]; result=0; } } return result; } }
